review: "Aventures allemandes (Intégrale Yoko Tsuno T.02)" is a captivating collection of graphic novels that blend intriguing science fiction with a touch of nostalgia. The stories, despite their dated technology, remain engaging thanks to their well-paced narratives and compelling artwork. The inclusion of a comprehensive 24-page dossier is a delightful bonus, offering insight into the creative process. While the technology might seem outdated, it doesn't detract from the overall enjoyment. This volume is a must-read for fans of graphic novels and those who appreciate a good balance of adventure and art.
